definition: enclosing frame made of bamboo, wire etc/cage/basket/steamer basket/to cover/to cage/to embrace/to manipulate through trickery

sentences.english: The lift has a cage with a platform.
sentences.chinese: 提升機有一個帶平臺的罐籠。

sentences.english: The cage was drawn up from the mine.
sentences.chinese: 罐籠從礦井裏吊了起來。

sentences.english: The miners are lowered into the mine by means of an elevator known as a cage.
sentences.chinese: 礦工藉助於叫作罐籠的升降機下井。

sentences.english: There is a long process and huge workload during cage design.
sentences.chinese: 目前罐籠的設計過程漫長，手工計算工作量龐大。
